plants.name: Swiss Cheese
plants.description: Great introductory plant for novices, easy to care for. Great for creating a relaxed environment.

plants.name: Money Tree
plants.description: A hardy mini tree that you don't have to worry too much about as the trunk holds water.

plants.name: Dragon tree
plants.description: A full leafy tree that can grow up to 2m tall indoors. Bends as it grows creating a calming canopy.

plants.name: Snake Plant
plants.description: Super tough, easy to care for and the best air purifying plant you can own. Can grow up to 1m tall.

plants.name: Golden Pothos
plants.description: Lovely heart-shaped leaves make this plant a winner in the looks department and it is also a great air purifier.

plants.name: Ponytail palm
plants.description: A unique-looking plant is easy to care for and even thrives on a bit of neglect as it can withstand drought and loves bright light.

plants.name: Pygmy Pineapple
plants.description: A great statement plant that grows a small cousin of the pineapple which you can eat but may be a little bitter.

plants.name: Bird of Paradise
plants.description: A favourite of King George III cultivated to grow well indoors this plant will look great in any space.

plants.name: Sweetheart Plant
plants.description: A vigorously growing trailing plant with a long life, put it up somewhere high to get the full effect.

plants.name: Areca Palm
plants.description: As a thirsty plant it transpires a lot of water making it an effective humidifier so great for relieving dry skin.

plants.name: Elephant Ear
plants.description: This striking plant is a great way of adding structure to your plant collection with its multiple upright stems & crinkly leaves.

plants.name: Velvet Plant
plants.description: Deliciously tactile, with dark foliage that is eminently strokable. It should help you relax, restore and focus.
